attributes.action: End the national lockdown 9 days early on 10th July.
attributes.background:
Considering major sporting events are allowed 10’s of thousands of people already. The current date is the 19th July. 

When was the last time England were in a final? 

Boris is already behind the team why doesn’t he get behind the nation and end the lockdown on the 10th July.

rejection.details: It can take up to 7 days for us to check petitions, so unfortunately we weren't able to check this petition in time.
